title: Supreme Court OKs block for now on congressionally-approved US aid
shortDescription: After he took office, President Trump paused all foreign aid and said any assistance that didn’t align with his priorities would be terminated.

title: Supreme Court to decide fate of Trump's sweeping tariffs
shortDescription: President Trump is relying on the tariffs to raise revenue, spur manufacturing and exert political pressure on other countries.

title: What is it like in Chicago? Trump Connect reporter takes you on a tour
shortDescription: President Donald Trump continuously toys with sending troops into Chicago to address crime. Follow our reporter in the city for an afternoon.

title: Who is Ken Griffin? Billionaire warns against Trump’s Fed attacks
shortDescription: Billionaire and Republican megadonor Ken Griffin, CEO of Citadel, wrote an op-ed in the Wall Street Journal warning against Trump's Fed attacks.

title: Israel's attack in Qatar was 'very unfortunate,' White House says
shortDescription: The White House issued a sharp rebuke of Israel's unprecedented airstrike in Qatar targeting Hamas leaders, criticizing the location of the attack.

title: Trump applauds West Point for canceling Tom Hanks award
shortDescription: US President Donald Trump has praised West Point for cancelling plans to honor Tom Hanks with a prestigious award, calling the actor a “destructive, woke” figure.

title: Trump calls Epstein birthday note a 'dead issue' after release of book
shortDescription: President Donald Trump declined to discuss a House committee's release of a note and lewd drawing purported to be from Trump to Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Epstein’s birthday letter released. Trump denies signing it
shortDescription: A letter purportedly from Donald Trump to Jeffrey Epstein was released. Trump denies the signature is his. What does enigma mean? What to know.

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to block FTC Commissioner reinstatement
shortDescription: President Trump asked the Supreme Court to block the reinstatement of Federal Trade Commission commissioner Rebecca Slaughter, according to CNBC.

title: Congress to hear more about UFOs. What's happened since last hearing?
shortDescription: Congress' latest foray into the topic of UFOs is scheduled for Tuesday, Sept. 9. What's happened since the last hearing in November?

title: Jury selection resumes in trial of man accused of trying to kill Trump
shortDescription: Ryan Routh faces charges of attempting to assassinate a major presidential candidate, assaulting a federal officer and weapons violations.

title: 4 witnesses to testify about UFOs to Congress: How to watch hearing
shortDescription: A House task force on government transparency is set to host a hearing Tuesday, Sept. 9 in which four witnesses will offer testimony about UFOs.

title: Trump talks sanctions on Russia after largest air attack on Ukraine
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is threatening tougher sanctions on Russia following the largest overnight air attack on Ukraine since the start of the war.

title: Is ICE chilling Chicago? Trump 'blitz' draws rage from immigrant groups
shortDescription: Federal agents have arrested four people so far and all have charges against them, according to officials. Locals say the arrests are sowing fear.

title: Hyundai battery-factory raid reveals new Trump target
shortDescription: The federal E-Verify system is supposed to help employers determine whether their workers are legal, but its use isn't always required.

title: Who is Ryan Routh, the man accused in Trump assassination attempt?
shortDescription: The trial in federal court in Florida began with jury selection on Sept. 8. Here's what we know about Ryan Routh and his past.

title: House GOP releases full Jeffrey Epstein 'birthday book.' What's in it?
shortDescription: House Republicans released the full Jeffrey Epstein 'birthday book,' including note purported to be from Donald Trump, which the president denies.
